ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 2: Key of Dreams
ComicInfo.Summary:
"There are a million ways of seeing..." Trapped Inside the Mona Lisa with Manny and Arthur, Margot learns the impossible rules of The Electric Sublime. Meanwhile, a mass suicide raises questions about the connection between art, the men in white, and the winking ideogram. This year's most topsy turvy series continues in an issue full of blood, sweat, and paint splatter.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Martin Morazzo (a) & Mat Lopes (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Stephanie Hans | 2 | Note: The digital edition (11/9/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 11:00:27. [CVDB557532]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Martin Morazzo, Mat Lopes, Stephanie Hans
ComicInfo.Characters: Arthur Brut, Manny the Mannequin, Margot Breslin
